text: Definitely hear tons of Mega Man. I'm assuming that Capcom used the same sound chip for a lot of their NES games.
author: Aegis29

text: There was no alternative. Capcom, as far as I'm aware, never developed any sound-capable MMC, so all of their soundtracks are from the stock NES CPU, the 2A03.
